channel.title: Court Wizard Rework Idea
channel.description:
Court Wizard
Day Abilities 1. **Bippity Boppity Boo** [2 Uses] : Gives the Court Wizard the names of people who are **currently bleeding** during the Day. 2. **Not Today** [1 Use] : Gives the Court Wizard the **ability to see through Troll Boxes**, a troll boxed message will be **highlighted in green** only towards the Court Wizard's if they used the ability during the Day. Night Abilities 1. **You Shall Not Pass** [Unlimited Uses] : Allows the Court Wizard to cast a wall around the Target, **preventing anyone from visiting them**. Unless the Court Wizard himself is killed on that Night. 2. **Savior** [1 Use] [Must wait until Day 3] : Allows the Court Wizard to **give the Target Conversion Immunity**. If the Target is conversion immune, the ability will still be used, and will not do any affect. [Cannot target King or Self.]
